name: Birdie
headline: Connect LinkedIn to your CRM to automate and track LinkedIn outreach.
description: Birdie supercharges your sales team’s outreach productivity on LinkedIn. We do this by automating outreach workflows and providing comprehensive activity analytics. We help individual sales reps save time, while also helping sales managers get full visibility into their LinkedIn outreach efforts.

founders.name: Daniel Hung, Co-founder / CEO
founders.description:
• MIT EECS
• Tech Lead @ Homejoy (S10)
• Head of Product @ Kite
• CEO @ Birdie (S21)

raw_markdown="[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ecd8061981781eea859013/647121306460ced13117b84d_birdie%20logo.svg)](https://www.getbirdie.io/<#>)
[How it works](https://www.getbirdie.io/<#how-it-works-home>)[Testimonials](https://www.getbirdie.io/<#testimonials-home>)[Explore Birdie](https://www.getbirdie.io/<https:/birdie.helpscoutdocs.com/>)
[Book a demo![Arrow icon
](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ecd8061981781eea859013/63f64571650d1201cf21b069_arrow.svg)](https://www.getbirdie.io/<https:/calendly.com/michael-birdie/birdie-demo>)
# Make the most of your time on
![linkedin logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ecd8061981781eea859013/63ecdf9094e12ded169c3bab_linkedin%20logo.png)
Stop copy and pasting. Start tracking all your important interactions. Increase your efficiency and get full visibility into your outreach efforts.
[Book a demo![arrow white](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ecd8061981781eea859013/63ee5b09fa8523186c75fcca_arrow.svg)](https://www.getbirdie.io/<https:/calendly.com/michael-birdie/birdie-demo>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ecd8061981781eea859013/64714f6d0fd875785be8f442_hero-demo.webp)
![birdie ui graphic](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ecd8061981781eea859013/63ece28ed33a6c1821dabee2_home%20team%20features.svg)
## Birdie supercharges your teams’ LinkedIn outreach productivity
Save time sending personalized connection requests, followup messages, and InMails.
  * Sales reps can quickly connect with leads
  * Recruiters can batch send messages
  * Managers can view their team activity


![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ecd8061981781eea859013/65e74b450f58124a105908c1_integrations-logos.png)
## Minimal setup to get started
All you need is a Google, Salesforce, HubSpot, Outreach, or Salesloft account. No need to create another username password combo to remember.
![birdie ui graphic](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ecd8061981781eea859013/63ed099a978089619722ffbf_template%20crm%20graphic.svg)
### Speed up your outreach with message templates
Birdie activates automatically as you’re using LinkedIn. Access all your message templates and populate them automatically when sending a connection request, LinkedIn message, or InMail. No more copy and pasting, and going back to edit text.
![birdie ui graphic](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ecd8061981781eea859013/63ed0b592bacb52ba097004b_personal%20touch%20graphic.svg)
### Send messages with a personal touch
Create message templates to use for different scenarios. Personalize templates with variables that get filled in with the receiving person’s actual info. You do this directly in your CRM, so you don’t need to learn how to use yet another website.
![birdie ui graphic](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ecd8061981781eea859013/63ed09dabb4195797bb9ac8d_track%20crm%20grpahic.svg)
### Track every interaction with your leads in your CRM
Birdie also tracks everything you’ve sent and received, so that you have full visibility of what you and your team is doing on LinkedIn. Use your data to ensure volume targets, analyze response rates, and more.
## Even more automation to help you stay on track
Send connection requests or messages to multiple people in one click.
![birdie ui graphic](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ecd8061981781eea859013/63ed0db50b148f922eb3d38e_automation%20img%20-1.svg)
Use sequences to never miss a follow-up ever again.
![birdie ui graphic](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ecd8061981781eea859013/63ed0db66e2b5e6da73e7185_automatiion%20img%20-%202.svg)
## Integrate with your CRM or SEP of choice
[Book a demo![arrow white](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ecd8061981781eea859013/63ee5b09fa8523186c75fcca_arrow.svg)](https://www.getbirdie.io/<https:/calendly.com/itsdhung/birdie-demo>)
Birdie is lightweight and doesn’t require you to learn how to use another CRM or SEP. Use the tools you already know how to use, and keep all your data in familiar places.
Birdie currently integrates with **Salesforce** , **HubSpot** , **Salesloft** , **Outreach** and **Google Sheets** , with more integrations coming. Want to fast track an integration with your CRM or SEP? Contact us.
[Check out our 2-page handout about Birdie for more info.](https://www.getbirdie.io/<https:/drive.google.com/file/d/1tls7w-p-MOqzCfi9CsX6jKBVszCwG2HP/view>)
## What are customers saying?

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ecd8061981781eea859013/6476bee8b75d28b0f3e892a4_reshape-logo.png)

generated_description:
### Birdie: Streamlining LinkedIn Outreach

**Overview**  
Founded in 2021 and part of Y Combinator’s S21 batch, Birdie aims to revolutionize the way sales teams engage on LinkedIn. Based in San Francisco, this nimble company, with a team of just two, has set out to eliminate the repetitive grind of manual outreach through effective automation and analytics.

**Mission**  
Birdie’s mission is simple yet impactful: connect LinkedIn to your CRM, automate outreach, and give you full visibility into your engagement efforts. This allows sales teams to focus on what really matters—building relationships rather than getting bogged down by administrative tasks.

**How It Works**  
By integrating seamlessly with popular CRMs like Salesforce, HubSpot, and Google Sheets, Birdie makes it easy for sales reps and recruiters to enhance their LinkedIn outreach:

- **Outreach Automation**: Save time by automating the sending of personalized connection requests and follow-up messages.
- **Activity Analytics**: Gain insights into team interactions, helping managers track performance and optimize outreach strategies.
- **Message Templates**: Craft personalized messages effortlessly by using templates. Fill in personalized variables directly from your CRM, eliminating the need for tedious copy-pasting.

**Customer Testimonials**  
Birdie isn't just theoretical—real users are finding value. Clients like David Melie from FirstIgnite note that Birdie has helped them "bypass LinkedIn's limitations," enabling them to send hundreds of messages quickly. Magnus Madsen of Reshape Biotech highlights how effortless it is to track LinkedIn activities in one centralized place.

**Getting Started**  
Birdie offers a minimum setup requirement. Simply use your existing Google, Salesforce, HubSpot, Outreach, or Salesloft account—no new logins needed. The software activates automatically when you use LinkedIn, and with features like sequence follow-ups, you can ensure you never miss an engagement.

**Why Birdie?**  
In a world where outreach can feel overwhelming, Birdie stands out by lightening the load. It integrates with systems you already use, making the transition smooth and keeping all your data in familiar spaces. Plus, as a lightweight SaaS solution, it avoids the clutter of learning a new platform.

If you're looking for a way to recover your day from tedious LinkedIn outreach, Birdie promises to supercharge your productivity. Interested? **[Book a demo](https://www.getbirdie.io)<#>** and experience it for yourself.

In short, Birdie isn’t just another tool—it’s a partner in transforming your sales engagement strategy, ensuring that you can focus on what really drives results.
